About this Site

Colophon & other details.

I'm a rookie developer.

I designed and painstakingly coded each and every bit of this site from scratch using semantic HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.

I built a simpler-looking version in 2019, though there was nothing simple about learning how to make it responsive. It was a great learning experience which paved the way for this current version.

I still have a lot to learn. Building this site, which I know isn't perfect (yet), is part of my education. I'm confident that I'll be able to improve and refine my front-end developing skills as I learn and practice more.

Technical Details

I built this site with Eleventy, a static site generator (SSG). It's hosted on Netlify.

This website uses third-party fonts from Google: Domine (body) and Roboto (headings).

I mostly use HTML generated icons shared by Toptal Designers, but some are from Fontawesome.

Design and Imagery

The site's colour pallete is inspired by the work of illustrator and graphic designer, Cynthia Alonso, whose use of vibrant colours loudly speaks to my heart.

Unless otherwise stated, I took all the images featured on this site.

In Case of Website Issues

If you experience any issues navigating this site, or have any comments or suggestions on how to improve its functionality or design, please let me now. I'd greatly appreciate your feedback.
